ShortDescription: Quess Corp Limited (Quess) is India’s leading business services provider, leveraging our extensive domain knowledge and future-ready digital platforms to drive client productivity through outsourced solutions.
enhanced_description: Quess Corp is India's leading business services provider and largest private sector employer, leveraging extensive domain knowledge and proprietary digital platforms. They deliver exceptional managed outsourcing services across a broad spectrum of processes including HR & F&A, IT & mobility, sales & marketing, customer care, back office operations, telecom operations, manufacturing, facilities, and security management. With over 500,000 employees across 9 countries serving 3,000+ clients, Quess Corp focuses on driving client productivity through outsourced solutions, including specialized staffing and recruitment services.
